about_the_game:
“Damn, I’ve never made clothes before!”

Philosia the Spider Witch lived such an extravagant lifestyle - splurging on designer brands was an everyday occurrence.
Her only way to avoid prison is by reopening an old boutique and paying back her debt!
With the help of Chirara the Spider Devil left behind by Macria, the boutiques' previous legendary owner, Philosia starts her epic task.
the epicenter of fashion and trends, what could be waiting for Philosia on ‘Royal Street’?

【Collect Mysterious Materials】
To make outfits... Obviously, you need materials!
Explore the world and collect mysterious materials to craft magic outfits.
Not all materials are easy to collect.

【Manufacturing of Materials Using Magic Spinning Wheel and Loom】
Manufacture the collected materials with magic and craft threads and fabric.
Gather various materials and craft cooler items!

【Craft Magic Outfits Using the Magical Sewing Machine】
You can make splendid clothing with manufactured materials.
As your crafting skills increase, more customers will pop in for a visit.
Of course, your first dress might look like a sack at first!...

【Requests to Craft Magical Clothing】
It’s time to take orders for magic outfits.
Earn rewards by crafting outfits for customers with different stories to share.
The higher the quality of your clothing, the more rewards you will collect.

【Decorating the Boutique to be Charming】
Customers of Royal Street are crazy for the latest trends.
During special seasons and events, decorate your boutique with seasonal wallpaper and decorative items!
Fame level will increase as the boutique becomes bigger and better.

【Diverse Episodes】
Philosia runs into unexpected troubles while running the boutique on Royal Street with Chirara the Spider Devil.
Philosia the vain Spider Witch's life undergoes big and unexpected changes.
What awaits Philosia?
detailed_description:
【Game Content Creation and Streaming Guide】

If the content you create contains spoilers for the ending, please be sure to include a notice that it contains spoilers.
If you post a link to the game store page in the outline and description of the content you have created, monetization is possible regardless of whether you are an individual or a corporation.
